newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sotheby's cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sotheby's cut to hold.

text.p: - Lazard Freres analyst Todd Slater said in a research note he lowered his recommendation on Sotheby's Holdings Inc to hold from buy and trimmed the 1997 earnings estimate to $0.84 per share from $0.85 and the 1998 estimate to $0.93 from $0.95.
-- The downgrade is based on "price and slower projected revenue growth."
-- Also, the "pipeline looks soft for the remainder of 1997 ... additional charges in 1997 likely to cover legal costs related to recent smuggling incident," according to the note.
